With a flap of his midnight wings, a huge, charcoal grey crow flies off to the ether. Gliding out to the ether on light brown wings, a young hippogriff vanishes from sight. Xenthos leaves to the ether, emanating an aura of immense power. Ilistala melds into the shadows, quickly disappearing from view. Raventhread: Read 41/41 articles. readnews politics 1544 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 27216w exkb- POLITICS NEWS #1544 Date: 10/23/2009 at 1:27 From: To : Everyone Subj: Hemp Wars The Hemp Wars between the villages of Delport and Stewartsville break out as the human villagers engage in a fierce economic struggle. No longer caring about the politics of the Basin, the Village of Delport declares itself free and no longer under the sphere of influence of the Great Alliance of Glomdoring, and the Village of Stewartsville declares itself free and no longer under the sphere of influence of the Great Alliance of Glomdoring. The Village of Delport has called down a temporary spell of peace to protect its borders, declaring that it does not ever wish war within its borders at any time. 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 27244w exkb- Miciah has been burned to death by General Vathael Valtyros, Knife of Fain. room find stewartsv 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 27244w exkb- [Rooms that match:] (447) Great Southern Highway nearing Stewartsville. There is an aetherways portal here. You see a single exit leading out. l 5896h, 5586m, 5601e, 6p, 26108en, 26943w exkb- The Portals of Glomdoring. (Glomdoring Forest.) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The cylindrical chamber has been carved from marble veined with dark sediment, and polished to a lustrous smooth shine. Concentric circles are inlaid upon the floor, alternating with rings of black opal, onyx and dark amethyst. High above, the ceiling shines with a bright light that pulsates softly and steadily like a heartbeat. The air itself is charged with energy, veritably crackling with power. A young female horse with a snow white tail stands here, pawing the ground. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. You see a sign here instructing you to use the PORTAL command to enter the aetherplex system. There is an aetherways portal here. (road). (lost) (Great Southern Highway.) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Running parallel to the Southern Mountains, the highway meanders through the lower boundaries of the basin of civilization. The ground is smoothed by time, by feet, by beasts of burden, all of whom continually press down upon any vegetation who dares to try to shoot a sprout up in the path of commerce. A small path leads to the hamlet of Stewartsville, a cosy little farming village amongst the flat fields of the southern plains. From here, the sound of children laughing can be heard. Attached to a wooden post here is a large metal bell. A young female horse with a snow white tail stands here, pawing the ground. A blackthorn sapling clings tenaciously to the ground here. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. Ruiku towers here. He wields a twisted staff in his left hand and a wyrm emblazoned shield in his right. You see exits leading north, east, and west. 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 27181w exkb- Ruiku takes a drink from an amethyst vial. 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 27181w exkb- Bowing his head, Krellan raises his arms to the sky and shouts loudly, shaking his fists. The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A dusty path leads away from the highway in a well-paved fashion that lends credence to the belief that it was handmade. Several white stones line the pathway in perpendicular lines that are carefully measured with carved signs that point toward a destination further along its flowing route. The encroaching flora and fauna normally so prevalent on these avenues have been carefully harvested and cut back to form a respectful delineation between road and scrub. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. (beauty) Your mana is regenerating by virtue of the Ray of Perfection. (perfection) Your health is regenerating by virtue of the Ray of the Merciful Hand. (mercy) You can walk upon water. (waterwalk) You are invisible. You are accompanied by an illusory glamour. You are blurry. You have insomnia, and cannot easily go to sleep. (insomnia) Your insides are warmed by a fire potion. (fire) You have ingested the kafe bean and are feeling extremely energetic. (kafe) You are tempered against fire damage. (frost) Your mind is sensing the death of others. (deathsense) You are viewing the world through the third eye. (thirdeye) You are walking on a small cushion of air. (levitate) The world is seen through your sixth sense. (sixthsense) You are extremely limber. You are concentrating on providing your muscles with increased elasticity. You are moving at an increased rate of speed. You are sensing disruptions in the aether. (lost) (Glomdoring Forest.) The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. Sidd towers here. He wields a klangaxe of darkened steel with both hands. (Glomdoring Forest.) The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. Sidd towers here. He wields a klangaxe of darkened steel with both hands. (Village of Stewartsville.) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Further along the path the twists reveal the farmhouse in the distance. Gleaming tile lines the roof in a sparkling pattern befitting a profitable home. Wired fences follow the pathway in a mirrored image and several animals lift their heads nosing the wind to catch the new scents. Piles of hay lie stacked about the lands in large bundles to provide food to those who might need it. The beautiful song of birds graces the pathway with a virtual concerto of musical delight. A blackthorn sapling clings tenaciously to the ground here. A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman. A jet black spider with a deadly stinger scuttles about here, clicking his mandibles together. Talan Ysav'rai is here, shrouded. She wields an athame dagger in her left hand. Spirit Warden Xenthos An'Ryshe, the Ebon Strategist is here. He wields a baleful rapier of darkened steel in each hand. Urazial Inseira is here, shrouded. He wields a glittering blackthorn lyre in his left hand and a wyrden shield of the seasons in his right. Nyir Ysav'rai, Keeper of the Black Nest towers here, shrouded. She wields a dark shield in the form of crow wings in her left hand and a mystic cudgel in her right. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. You see exits leading east, south (open door), and west. Shadows ooze out of the pores of Nyir, coating her skin in a black shell. She cries out in pain as her body bubbles and warps under the cover of this shell, which finally cracks apart and reveals smoother skin and muscles more defined and shapely. She brushes her hair vainly, showing off her beautiful, new physique. Shadows ooze out of the pores of Xenthos, coating his skin in a black shell. (Village of Stewartsville.) There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A muddy path lined with cart tracks leads towards the farm in the distance. The obvious original source for the various food goods that are so prevalent within town, its rustic appearance hides an underlying truly modern and efficient production line. Several cows wander about in bovine fashion, large bells dangling with a strangely melodic ring that echoes throughout the area. Huge areas marked for planting lie in both directions and are breath-taking when viewed as a whole. A rowan sapling clings tenaciously to the ground here. A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman. Swathed in the unholy black fires of Nil, a fallen pegasus regards the area with grim intensity. A demure willowisp floats lazily in the air here, bound by shadows. Massive black skeletal wings filling much of the space around her, a savage hippogriff stands here, her tail swishing idly. Spirit Warden Xenthos An'Ryshe, the Ebon Strategist is here. He wields a baleful rapier of darkened steel in each hand. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. Nyir Ysav'rai, Keeper of the Black Nest towers here, shrouded. She wields a dark shield in the form of crow wings in her left hand and a mystic cudgel in her right. Overseer Kalaneya Nightshade is here, shrouded. She wields a bloodlotus nekai in each hand. Talan Ysav'rai is here. She wields an athame dagger in her left hand. Priestess Nori Stormcrow, Initiate of Night's Secrets is here. Lady Nienla Nightshade, the Shadow of Silence is here, shrouded. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. (Village of Stewartsville.) The shadows have been gathered here. There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently arou nd. The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A muddy path lined with cart tracks leads towards the farm in the distance. The obvious original source for the various food goods that are so prevalent within town, its rustic appearance hides an underlying truly modern and efficient production line. Several cows wander about in bovine fashion, large bells dangling with a strangely melodic ring that echoes throughout the area. Huge areas marked for planting lie in both directions and are breath-taking when viewed as a whole. A rowan sapling clings tenaciously to the ground here. A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman. A demure willowisp floats lazily in the air here, bound by shadows. Massive black skeletal wings filling much of the space around her, a savage hippogriff stands here, her tail swishing idly. A young female horse with a snow white tail stands here, pawing the ground. Spirit Warden Xenthos An'Ryshe, the Ebon Strategist is here. He wields a baleful rapier of darkened steel in each hand. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. Overseer Kalaneya Nightshade is here, shrouded. She wields a bloodlotus nekai in each hand. Lady Nienla Nightshade, the Shadow of Silence is here, shrouded. Priestess Nori Stormcrow, Initiate of Night's Secrets is here. Talan Ysav'rai is here. She wields an athame dagger in her left hand. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. Nyir Ysav'rai, Keeper of the Black Nest towers here, shrouded. She wields a dark shield in the form of crow wings in her left hand and a mystic cudgel in her right. She is 95 years old, having been born on the 24th of Klangiary, 152 years after the Coming of Estarra. She is ranked 198th in Lusternia. She is an extremely credible character. She holds the position of an Insidious Instructor in the Cacophony. She is a Visionary of Distance in the Fellowship of Explorers. She is a graduate of the Ancestral Glade of the Moonharts, the Empyreal Academy (honours), and the College of Necromantic & Tainted Research (honours). She is a member of the clan called 'Dawneye Tribe.' She is a member of the clan called 'The Shanthine Pride.' She is a member of the clan called 'Wishes.' She is a member of the clan called 'The Aethercity of Deepnight.' She is a mentor and able to take on proteges. Her motto: 'Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving.' She is deemed an Apprentice by the Bardic Council of Vesteran Honours. She is considered to be approximately 25% of your might. She is not currently active in any family. (Village of Stewartsville.?) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. Further along the path the twists reveal the farmhouse in the distance. Gleaming tile lines the roof in a sparkling pattern befitting a profitable home. Wired fences follow the pathway in a mirrored image and several animals lift their heads nosing the wind to catch the new scents. Piles of hay lie stacked about the lands in large bundles to provide food to those who might need it. The beautiful song of birds graces the pathway with a virtual concerto of musical delight. A blackthorn sapling clings tenaciously to the ground here. A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman. A jet black spider with a deadly stinger scuttles about here, clicking his mandibles together. A demure willowisp floats lazily in the air here, bound by shadows. Wyrden Snare Toracu d'Syr, Ward of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields a flying dragon klangaxe with both hands. Urazial Inseira is here, shrouded. He wields a glittering blackthorn lyre in his left hand and a wyrden shield of the seasons in his right. Spirit Warden Xenthos An'Ryshe, the Ebon Strategist is here. He wields a baleful rapier of darkened steel in each hand. Priestess Nori Stormcrow, Initiate of Night's Secrets is here. She wields an athame dagger in her left hand. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. Krellan Ysav'rai, Talons of Crow is here, shrouded. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. Overseer Kalaneya Nightshade is here, shrouded. She wields a bloodlotus nekai in each hand. Talan Ysav'rai is here, shrouded. She wields an athame dagger in her left hand. Nyir Ysav'rai, Keeper of the Black Nest towers here, shrouded. She wields a dark shield in the form of crow wings in her left hand and a mystic cudgel in her right. You see exits leading east, south (open door), and west. (lost) (Village of Stewartsville.) This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A manor erupts from the grounds ahead outstripping any other landmark nearby for pure beauty. Gleaming ivory columns wend their way upward in a spiral of luminescence towards the arched overhangs glistening against the gold-veined rooftop. The entrance to the mansion is carved oak, delicate scrollwork of various scenes detailed to the very top of the doors. Two golden knockers lie heavy with an intricate jewel held between them. The letter C seems to glow within the jewel's confines, a dazzling sapphire display that bespeaks the obvious opulence veiled within this demesne. (lost) (Village of Stewartsville.) This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. At the junction between roads, several vendors occasionally gather to hawk their wares on colourful blankets strewn across the edges of the streets. Several deep ruts attest to the frequent carts that travel the crossroads trundling by with the fruits of the farmers' labors. Birds can be seen at all times as the fish that are dropped during passage tend to attract avians of every type. Several shops line the intersection, their signs swaying in the ever constant sea breeze. A tall obelisk rises up here from the ground. A village woman walks about here, perhaps shopping for her family. (lost) (Village of Stewartsville.) This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. At the junction between roads, several vendors occasionally gather to hawk their wares on colourful blankets strewn across the edges of the streets. Several deep ruts attest to the frequent carts that travel the crossroads trundling by with the fruits of the farmers' labors. Birds can be seen at all times as the fish that are dropped during passage tend to attract avians of every type. Several shops line the intersection, their signs swaying in the ever constant sea breeze. A tall obelisk rises up here from the ground. A village woman walks about here, perhaps shopping for her family. You see exits leading northeast, south, and northwest. 5590h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 25397en, 25912w exkb-(south) Path to Stewartsville. (lost) (Village of Stewartsville.?) This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Thesia Cylys, the white tiger prowls here quietly. Swathed in the unholy black fires of Nil, a fallen pegasus regards the area with grim intensity. A skeletal, white stallion with leathery wings stands firm here. Father Talkan La'Saet towers here, shrouded. He wields an ivory symbol bearing a black and gold trimmed amphora in his left hand. Ruiku towers here. He wields a twisted staff in his left hand and a wyrm emblazoned shield in his right. General Vathael Valtyros, Knife of Fain is here, shrouded. He wields a hideous hammer of depraved steel in each hand. Lord Fist Romero, Dark Prince of Demons is here, shrouded. He wields a damning symbol of domination in his left hand. (lost) (Village of Stewartsville.?) There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A gnarled crimson spider with a glistening stinger scuttles about here, dripping venom from her mandibles. A demure willowisp floats lazily in the air here, bound by shadows. A skeletal, white stallion with leathery wings stands firm here. A jet black spider with a deadly stinger scuttles about here, clicking his mandibles together. The soul of Urazial roams the land, bodiless. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. Scordatura Pizzicato, Narsrim D'cente`, Crescendo of Transformation towers here, shrouded. He wields a darkwood mandolin encased in iron filigree and bone in his left hand and a Wand of Illusions in his right. Ruiku towers here. He wields a twisted staff in his left hand and a wyrm emblazoned shield in his right. Lord Fist Romero, Dark Prince of Demons is here. He wields a damning symbol of domination in his left hand. He wields an athame dagger in his left hand and a mystic cudgel in his right. General Vathael Valtyros, Knife of Fain is here, shrouded. He wields a hideous hammer of depraved steel in each hand. Slowly, a skeleton forms from the aether, and muscles appear upon the bones, bubbling up in a frothy spray of blood. Finally, new skin stretches out and covers your new body, and you step out from the Master Ravenwood Tree. Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. The shadows have been gathered here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Through the cosmic window, you see Krellan at dairy. l 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 26997w xkb- Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. (lost) (Glomdoring Forest.) The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. You see a single exit leading north. 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 26997w xkb- springup You have recovered equilibrium. 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 26997w exkb- thirdeye 5896h, 5943m, 6240e, 10p, 26140en, 26997w exkb- You already possess the thirdeye. 5896h, 5943m, 6537e, 10p, 26140en, 27625w exkb-
Plush sitting room. (Village of Stewartsville.)
This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. This room is spacious with a large bay
window overlooking Stewartsville and the surrounding countryside. A thick carpet is on the marble
floors, intricately woven with interlocking designs. There are several cushioned, high backed chairs
and divans situated comfortably in the room. Candelabra are on top of small wooden tables that sit
next to the furniture. Darcy Wainwright is here, smoking a pipe.
You see exits leading north and west.

Swimming Any beast can be trained to ford waters. Balancing Beasts trained to balance will be harder to move. Battle Prepare your beast for the rigours of battle. Galloping Gallop at great speed upon a mounted beast. Whistling Whistle to call your active beast to your side. Armour Thicken the hide of a beast so it takes less damage. Trader You can trade your beast, bestowing its loyalty to another. Diving Explore the ocean depths courtesy of your loyal beast. StableMaster Remove or house your beast from anywhere. Regeneration Quicken your beast’s metabolism to heighten regeneration. Trotting Your beast is able to trot quickly across the land. Aggressive Increase the damage of battle beasts. Jumping Your beast can jump over obstacles blocking exits. MinorBreath Transform your beast to breathe magical blasts. Influencing With a well trained beast, influencing can be made easier. AdvancedRiding You’ve learned advanced skills for riding a mount. Flying With wings, your beast can take you to the clouds. BeastEmpath Use your own energy to provide for your beasts. BEASTMASTERY - SPELLCASTING

Syntax: BEAST ORDER CAST [REFLECTION|HYPNOTICGAZE] [] Beast Mana: 1500 Some beasts are intelligent enough that you can train them to cast spells.

For Training: Syntax: BEAST TRAIN CAST [REFLECTION|HYPNOTICGAZE] Type: Mind Trains: 200 (each spell)

(Village of Stewartsville.) There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. The corrosiveness of the taint sickens the land. The eastern wall is completely glass, arching outwards and reinforced with wooden frames. Though it must be a ridiculously meticulous task to clean the windows, they sparkle without a smudge. The room is rather humid, though the orchids seem to appreciate this for they have grown to respectable heights and their flowers have opened in a variety of colours. Ferns and potted trees also crowd the solarium. Cast iron tables and chairs are painted white and situated among the greenery placed here. Sir Archibald Prescott stands here stiffly at attention. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. There are 2 pennyroyal bunches in 2 groups here. You see a single exit leading west (open door). 5896h, 4849m, 5888e, 10p, 26140en, 26980w exkb-

There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. The corrosiveness of the taint sickens the land. The eastern wall is completely glass, arching outwards and reinforced with wooden frames. Though it must be a ridiculously meticulous task to clean the windows, they sparkle without a smudge. The room is rather humid, though the orchids seem to appreciate this for they have grown to respectable heights and their flowers have opened in a variety of colours. Ferns and potted trees also crowd the solarium. Cast iron tables and chairs are painted white and situated among the greenery placed here. Sir Archibald Prescott stands here stiffly at attention. (Village of Stewartsville.) The corrosiveness of the taint sickens the land. The eastern wall is completely glass, arching outwards and reinforced with wooden frames. Though it must be a ridiculously meticulous task to clean the windows, they sparkle without a smudge. The room is rather humid, though the orchids seem to appreciate this for they have grown to respectable heights and their flowers have opened in a variety of colours. Ferns and potted trees also crowd the solarium. Cast iron tables and chairs are painted white and situated among the greenery placed here. Sir Archibald Prescott stands here stiffly at attention. The Enigmatic Stairs. (road). (Avechna’s Peak.) Superimposed over this location, an ethereal forest reaches up to the sky. It is raining lightly, and fat drops of rain fall pleasantly past. Standing next to a wooden cart, Jeremiah Gryphta loudly barks about his fine wares. (road). (Great Southern Highway.) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. Filling the firmament is a lattice of heavy grey clouds. Running parallel to the Southern Mountains, the highway meanders through the lower boundaries of the basin of civilization. The ground is smoothed by time, by feet, by beasts of burden, all of whom continually press down upon any vegetation who dares to try to shoot a sprout up in the path of commerce. The journey on this highway is as monotonous as it is dependable, as the landscape is mostly made up of an expanse of moors and fields that stretch off towards the Southern Mountains to the south and the Inner Sea to the north. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. You see exits leading east and northwest. 5896h, 5518m, 6834e, 10p, 26120en, 27145w exkb-(northwest) Great Southern Highway. (road). Commented by jlhealy@xxx (author) on 23Â Oct 2009

——– PART TEN ——–

You weave a glamour and mold it until it becomes a reflection of yourself. 5896h, 5468m, 6834e, 10p, 26104en, 27154w xkb- You must regain equilibrium first. 5896h, 5468m, 6834e, 10p, 26104en, 27154w xkb- springup You have recovered equilibrium. 5896h, 5468m, 6834e, 10p, 26124en, 27154w exkb- l 5896h, 5468m, 6834e, 10p, 26124en, 27154w exkb- Great Southern Highway. (road). (Great Southern Highway.) Superimposed over this location, an ethereal forest reaches up to the sky. Filling the firmament is a lattice of heavy grey clouds. Running parallel to the Southern Mountains, the highway meanders through the lower boundaries of the basin of civilization. The ground is smoothed by time, by feet, by beasts of burden, all of whom continually press down upon any vegetation who dares to try to shoot a sprout up in the path of commerce. The journey on this highway is as monotonous as it is dependable, as the landscape is mostly made up of an expanse of moors and fields that stretch off towards the Southern Mountains to the south and the Inner Sea to the north. A lavishly supple bed is in the centre of the room, covered in a puffy silk comforter. The comforter is an almost metallic blue, woven with patterns of golden yellow, green and brown. Drapes and cushions match these deliciously vibrant colours. Mount (Cast Hypnoticgaze)
5896h, 5299m, 6323e, 10p, 25650en, 26167w exk-
A soft moan rises up from the ground as a shadowy bubble forms around you.
ab beastmastery
5896h, 5299m, 6323e, 10p, 25670en, 26181w exk-
You have gained the following abilities in Beastmastery:
Riding Train any beast to be your loyal mount.
Swimming Any beast can be trained to ford waters.
Balancing Beasts trained to balance will be harder to move.
Battle Prepare your beast for the rigours of battle.
Galloping Gallop at great speed upon a mounted beast.
Whistling Whistle to call your active beast to your side.
Armour Thicken the hide of a beast so it takes less damage.
Trader You can trade your beast, bestowing its loyalty to another.
Diving Explore the ocean depths courtesy of your loyal beast.
StableMaster Remove or house your beast from anywhere.
Regeneration Quicken your beast’s metabolism to heighten regeneration.
Trotting Your beast is able to trot quickly across the land.
Aggressive Increase the damage of battle beasts.
Jumping Your beast can jump over obstacles blocking exits.
MinorBreath Transform your beast to breathe magical blasts.
Influencing With a well trained beast, influencing can be made easier.
AdvancedRiding You’ve learned advanced skills for riding a mount.
Flying With wings, your beast can take you to the clouds.
BeastEmpath Use your own energy to provide for your beasts.
Burrowing Train your beast to burrow deep into the ground.
Gust Use your beast’s wings to create powerful gusts of wind.
MajorBreath Major breath weapons fill an entire room.
Healing Channel your beast’s healing energies into yourself.
Blocking Train your beast to block exits.
Scaling Scale up to the mountain peaks and down again.
Chameleon Train your beast to be invisible from prying eyes.
Kicking Use your beast to kick an unmounted opponent.
Trampling Frenzy your steed to trample all prone in your location.
Curing Allow your beasts natural healing energies to cure you.
Bodyguard Your loyal beast will attempt to protect you.
Poison Venom sacs allow your beast to spit poisons at your foes.
Spellcasting The most intelligent beasts can be trained to cast spells.
Beastmaster Claim one skill over which you have complete mastery.
AB BEASTMASTERY for more information on an ability.
ab beastmastery beastempath
5896h, 5374m, 6459e, 10p, 25690en, 26195w exk-
BEASTMASTERY - BEASTEMPATH

Syntax: BEAST EMPATH [HEALTH|MANA|EGO] Your bond with your loyal beasts are so great that you can channel your own health, mana or ego into your beasts. Note that this uses a beast action, as though you ordered them. songstat 5896h, 5299m, 6667e, 10p, 25710en, 26209w exk- You are currently on the 8th stanza of “Safetydance”. Finally, new skin stretches out and covers your new body, and you step out from the Master Ravenwood Tree. Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. The shadows have been gathered here. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. 5896h, 5943m, 6091e, 8p, 26140en, 26951w exkb- 5896h, 5943m, 6091e, 8p, 26140en, 26951w exkb- A shadowlord widowrider nods to Pruxi as he leads his giant black widow around. l 5896h, 5943m, 6091e, 8p, 26140en, 26951w exkb- Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. (lost) (Glomdoring Forest.) The shadows have been gathered here. The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. A nut from a ravenwood tree leaf rests on the ground. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. Penumbra Amumnin, Servant of Shadows is here. He wields a nature talisman in his left hand. Pruxi, Echo of the Wyrd is here, shrouded. He wields an elegant jet black viola in his left hand and a wyrden teacup in his right. You see a single exit leading north. 5896h, 5943m, 6091e, 8p, 26140en, 26965w exkb-(down) A dark nighthag turns her gaze to watch you leave. Under a dark root. (Glomdoring Forest.) The shadowy outline of a twisted forest casts a dark gloom here. Suspended from the large black root hangs a bubbling black cauldron. Dressed in liquid shadows, Rowena Nightshade stands here regally poised. Mount (Cast Hypnoticgaze)

(The Swarm): Viynain says, “Lehki entered my meld in Stewartville.” l 5896h, 5943m, 5039e, 10p, 26140en, 27213w exkb- Meir has succumbed to the shadows of Dirgesinger Desitrus Kamau’s music. 5896h, 5943m, 5039e, 10p, 26140en, 27213w exkb- Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. (lost) (Glomdoring Forest.) The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. Reim Llaewell, Tender of the Swarms is here. He wields a black steel nekai in each hand. Perfect Narynth, The Imperfect Druidess is here, shrouded. She wields a mystic cudgel in her left hand and a wyrden shield with the image of a drum in her right. You see a single exit leading north. 5896h, 5943m, 5039e, 10p, 26140en, 27213w exkb-(down) A dark nighthag turns her gaze to watch you leave. Under a dark root. (Glomdoring Forest.) Dressed in liquid shadows, Rowena Nightshade stands here regally poised. Druidess Arii y’Kada, of the Blackthorn is here, shrouded. She wields a golden sickle in her left hand. (The Swarm): Viynain says, “Lehki has left the Village of Stewartsville.” 5896h, 5943m, 6483e, 10p, 26140en, 27242w exkb- Before the Master Ravenwood Tree. (Glomdoring Forest.) The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. The dark heart of Glomdoring Forest is almost audibly beating in this, its shadowy centre. Tall, blackened trees surround this clearing, pressing together into an imposing barrier of rotten vegetation. Moulds and fungi are smeared across the plants, their pungent stench suffusing the forest. The branches are coated in dark slime, slick tendrils that hang downwards. Although a variety of trees might actually grow here, the black tar that coats them renders them indistinguishable. A thin black mist creeps between the trees, hanging low across the ground. The floor of the clearing itself is simply bare earth, cracked and dry. Overshadowing all is the Master Ravenwood Tree itself, jutting into the sky like a twisted fist. The sound of laughing crows echoes down from the treetops, a harsh sound for the ears below. The atmosphere vibrates with a palpable power. Brennan Stormcrow paces here, his cadaverous body twitching with sudden jerks. The Master Ravenwood Tree towers over everything here, pulsing with an immeasurable yet dark power. There are 12 dark nighthags here. A mature rowan tree stands proudly here. Casting darkness all around, a shadow totem thrusts up from the ground, chilling the air. There are 3 black direwolves here. His sinister red eyes constantly moving about the area, a shadowlord pauses here. A giant bat hangs here, wings folded about its body and one beady eye open. There are 2 illithoid scourges here. Nekai at the ready, an illithoid shade stands guard here. Covered in bone armour, a green eyelash viper is slithering about here. An ancient and skeletal tree surrounded by bushes of glittering black roses stands tall against the test of time. There are 8 shadowlord widowriders here. In the shape of an open palm, a metallic sigil lies here. Mushrooms are growing here in a perfect circle. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a bat around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a beetle around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a spider around its skull. An animated skeleton stands here with a ghostly outline of a wasp around its skull. Surrounded by domothean death energies, an enormous map of the Catacombs of the Dead stretches across the open air. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. Perfect Narynth, The Imperfect Druidess is here, shrouded. She wields a mystic cudgel in her left hand and a wyrden shield with the image of a drum in her right. Penumbra Yunli, Servant of Wisdom is here. Reim Llaewell, Tender of the Swarms is here. He wields a black steel nekai in each hand. You see a single exit leading north. 5896h, 5943m, 6483e, 10p, 26140en, 27242w exkb- 5896h, 5943m, 6483e, 10p, 26140en, 27242w exkb-

(road). (lost) (Great Southern Highway.) The corrosiveness of the taint sickens the land. A duststorm rages here. The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Running parallel to the Southern Mountains, the highway meanders through the lower boundaries of the basin of civilization. The ground is smoothed by time, by feet, by beasts of burden, all of whom continually press down upon any vegetation who dares to try to shoot a sprout up in the path of commerce. A small path leads to the hamlet of Stewartsville, a cosy little farming village amongst the flat fields of the southern plains. From here, the sound of children laughing can be heard. (Village of Stewartsville.) There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. A lavishly supple bed is in the centre of the room, covered in a puffy silk comforter. The comforter is an almost metallic blue, woven with patterns of golden yellow, green and brown. Drapes and cushions match these deliciously vibrant colours. A dressing table with mirror, a wardrobe and a sitting chair are also in the room, and a vase with peacock feathers sits on the table, overflowing with iridescent colours. Leaning against a wall, Lord Montgomery Estenborough lounges about here. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. A wooden key lies on the ground. Archmage Telperion Eli’Silar, Testament of Truth is here, floating on the water. He wields a coral staff in his left hand and a silver scaled shield emblazoned with crossed blades in his right. You see a single exit leading north (closed door). 5629h, 5053m, 5424e, 9p, 26140en, 26121w xkb- A shimmering light passes through Telperion. 5629h, 5053m, 5424e, 9p, 26140en, 26121w xkb-

(Glomdoring): Krellan says, “I broke munsia’ end.” 5629h, 5053m, 5424e, 9p, 26140en, 26121w xkb- springup You have recovered equilibrium. 5629h, 5053m, 5424e, 9p, 26140en, 26121w exkb- perform song safetydance telperion 5629h, 5053m, 5424e, 9p, 26140en, 26121w exkb- “Widows bite and barbed thorns pierce,” you sing, making a sleek grey viola etched with feathers cry out with haunting notes. 5629h, 5053m, 4949e, 9p, 26130en, 26115w xkb-(drink bromides) You take a drink from a jade vial. There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water. A lavishly supple bed is in the centre of the room, covered in a puffy silk comforter. The comforter is an almost metallic blue, woven with patterns of golden yellow, green and brown. Drapes and cushions match these deliciously vibrant colours. A dressing table with mirror, a wardrobe and a sitting chair are also in the room, and a vase with peacock feathers sits on the table, overflowing with iridescent colours. Leaning against a wall, Lord Montgomery Estenborough lounges about here. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. A wooden key lies on the ground. Archmage Telperion Eli’Silar, Testament of Truth is here. He wields a coral staff in his left hand and a silver scaled shield emblazoned with crossed blades in his right. There is a maelstrom of rainbow colours whipping violently around. This location is flooded with shallow, crystal clear water. A lavishly supple bed is in the centre of the room, covered in a puffy silk comforter. The comforter is an almost metallic blue, woven with patterns of golden yellow, green and brown. Drapes and cushions match these deliciously vibrant colours. A dressing table with mirror, a wardrobe and a sitting chair are also in the room, and a vase with peacock feathers sits on the table, overflowing with iridescent colours. Leaning against a wall, Lord Montgomery Estenborough lounges about here. A young giant spider with a barbed stinger scuttles about here. Archmage Telperion Eli’Silar, Testament of Truth is here. He wields a coral staff in his left hand and a silver scaled shield emblazoned with crossed blades in his right. He wields a blackened steel katana with both hands. Commandant Kalas Ixion, Ouroborian Avatar is here, shrouded. He wields a menacing double-edged klangaxe with both hands.
